content: Join our Twitter Space with CIFDAQ Chief Investment Officer Rohit Pateria, & our Co-founder & Global CEO, Rahul Maradiya hosted by Eshana Lutawan.When: Tuesday, Nov 15th,1 PM UTCSet your reminders!https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OdKrznRVgYKXKnow more about CIFDAQ: https://linktr.ee/cifdaq

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: We are elated to announce that CIFDAQ is going LIVE on LinkedIn with our Co-Founder & Global CEO, Rahul Maradiya, and Oliver von Wolff, Co-Founder & CEO of Helion Ventures to discuss the leadership in blockchain SpaceWhen: Thursday, November 17Time: 12PM UTC / 4PM UAESet your reminders and join us:https://linkedin.com/video/event/urn:li:ugcPost:6996727187005403136/To know more about the project:linktr.ee/cifdaq
